properties.title: Textual IRC Client Extras
properties.certificate: 3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: BestTechie Holdings, Inc.

choice.title: Scripts
choice.description: This package installs all custom scripts that are exempt from the sandbox. What's included: apps, music, np, page, qt, spotify, rdio, vlc, and yolo.

choice.title: Extensions
choice.description: This package installs extensions that may be found useful to a select group of users. What's included: Wiki-style link parser to automatically replace [[<title>]] text blocks with the actual link.

requirement.message: The ability for addons to be executed outside of the Mac OS sandbox was not introduced until Mountain Lion. Installing these addons on an earlier version of Mac OS will result in them doing absolutely nothing.
